title: WHY RENT WHEN YOU CAN BUY !!! KATY HOME TONS OF SPACE & UPGRADES!!!
posting_body: ['This beautiful home is around 2094 square foot, with 4 bed rooms and 2 bath rooms.', 'As per seller: It recently upgrades to hard vinyl plank floors.', 'The house is located in the highly sought after Tamarron community.', 'This home offers an open concept living area!', 'Any cook would be glad to create family meals or prepare for entertaining guests in this open, efficient kitchen, w/large pantry, stainless appliances, granite counters, & tons of counter space/storage.', 'The massive island offers enough room for 4 stools w/room left over.', 'The living area is spacious and is open to the dining area that will accommodate a large table.', 'HUGE primary bedroom is ready for your king-size bed & sitting area.', 'You will love the double sinks in the primary bath and the huge walk-in closet.', 'The utility room is big enough for your washer/dryer w/room left over for an extra fridge!', 'This community offers walking trails, lakes, resort, swimming pool, park, monster water slide.', '1.', 'Did you know that the monthly mortgage on a home would be less than you pay for rent?', '2.', 'Did you know that there are loan programs to help you purchase a home with little or no money down?', '3.', 'Did you know you can even buy a home with your friend?', 'Instead of splitting the rent, you can split down payment and split the mortgage!', 'City Group Properties works with lenders, owner financing, and rent to own programs to help you stop renting and start owning!', 'Call me today, to see what I can do for you or visit my website at:', 'copy and paste this link in your browser ===>  <URL>', 'Claudia Cooper', 'Licensed Realtor', 'City Group Properties', 'show contact info', ')', 'financing options available: fha, va, usda loans, rent to own, rent with option, owner finance, Katy cypress fulshear Brookshire sealy Rosenberg Richmond']
